t: Amazon HQ2 - Wikipedia
s: 2 weeks ago - Amazon HQ2 is Amazon's corporate headquarters in National Landing in Crystal City, Virginia (part of Arlington County) in the Washington, D.C. area, and an expansion of the company's headquarters in Seattle, Washington. Phase I, which has capacity for 14,000 employees, opened in June 2023.
